resources.string: Easer does NOT have all permissions it needs.
Prevented saving data with invalid field(s). Please recheck your choices / inputs.
Easer needs permission <%s> for this function.

Ease your life by automatically performing routine actions / operations on your phone(s).
 Chain different events and let their corresponding actions performed. No longer need to keep them in mind!
 This app was inspired by CyanogenMod's 'profile' mechanism and IFTTT. The original intuition was to automatically change the profile on certain time or specific WiFi connections, and it was expanded for more general use then.
 Reminder: Easer is still in development. It may contain bugs and the UI definitely needs to be improved. Current plans are described in the TODO.en.md (or TODO.md if you can read Chinese) document in the repo. If you are interested, please have a look.

This program is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or (at your option) any later version.

Show welcome message on app startup
Save logs to external storage devices (/sdcard/logger) to aid bug reports.\nChange of this setting will take effect from next time Easer starts.
Export all events and profiles to SD Card.\nFile will be named after current time.
Import all events and profiles in a zip file.\nExisting events and profiles with same name will be replaced.

Welcome to use Easer! 
Hope you like this app :) 

Please read these before starting:
 1. Please grant Easer corresponding permissions before using relevant events and profiles.
 2. Each event is actually single selection. Selecting multiple items in the same event will take no effect. 

Also have a look at FAQ in the project wiki.
